QueryResult.text: SELECT COMPANY_CODE, MASTER_PROJECT_CODE, changeorder, projrevisionid, PROJECT_CODE, budgetrevision, datesrevision, currenttargetedstartdate, previoustargetedstartdate, actualstartdate, currenttargetedcompldate, previoustargetedcompldate, actualcompletiondate, inprogress, awaitingapproval, approved, RESOURCE_CODE, APPROVEDBY_RESOURCE_CODE, revisiondatetime, needapprovaldatetime, approveddatetime, notes, AWAITAPPRVL_RESOURCE_CODE FROM projrevision WHERE approved = 1 AND projrevisionid > 0
